text: Dirty Talk may refer to: * Dirty talk, spoken graphically descriptive sexual imagery used for foreplay * "Dirty Talk" (Klein + M.B.O. song), 1982 * "Dirty Talk" (Wynter Gordon song), 2010 * Dirty language, cursing, cussing, and/or swearing ==See also== * dirt talk or dirt talking, see Trash-talk * Talk Dirty (disambiguation)
title: Dirty Talk (disambiguation)
